column4: simple question, I'm trying to set up a LAMP server using ubunto and would like to know if there is a GUI command I can use from the command prompt
I've installed it, that was easy, no, it's installed but I only get the command prompt
mostly to configure it, but I can't seem to find the right files under the command prompt (still relitivly new to linux as well, very basic experience, although I've found it's much like dos)
try typing startx at the command prompt and tell me what it says
